Movies.Title: Inception
Movies.Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
Movies.Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page

Movies.Title: Pulp Fiction
Movies.Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
Movies.Cast: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson

Movies.Title: The Matrix
Movies.Description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
Movies.Cast: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss

Movies.Title: Definitely, Maybe
Movies.Description: A political consultant tries to explain his impending divorce and past relationships to his 11-year-old daughter.
Movies.Cast: Ryan Reynolds, Rachel Weisz, Abigail Breslin

Movies.Title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
Movies.Description: Benjamin Barry bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days. Andie Anderson is assigned to write an article on 'How to Lose a Guy in 10 days.' They meet in a bar.
Movies.Cast: Kate Hudson, Matthew McConaughey, Adam Goldberg

Movies.Title: Split
Movies.Description: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.
Movies.Cast: James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy, Haley Lu Richardson

Movies.Title: The Dark Knight
Movies.Description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
Movies.Cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

Movies.Title: Gladiator
Movies.Description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
Movies.Cast: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen

Movies.Title: Avatar
Movies.Description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
Movies.Cast: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver

Movies.Title: Man of Steel
Movies.Description: An alien child is evacuated from his dying world and sent to Earth to live among humans. His peace is threatened when other survivors of his home planet invade Earth.
Movies.Cast: Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon

Movies.Title: Arrival
Movies.Description: A linguist is recruited by the military to assist in translating alien communications.
Movies.Cast: Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker

Movies.Description: A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.
Movies.Cast: John Cusack, Thandie Newton, Chiwetel Ejiofor

Movies.Title: Gifted
Movies.Description: Frank, a single man raising his child prodigy niece Mary, is drawn into a custody battle with his mother.
Movies.Cast: Chris Evans, Mckenna Grace, Lindsay Duncan

Movies.Title: Wedding Crashers
Movies.Description: A pair of committed womanizers who sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic tinge in the air, find themselves at odds with one another when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.
Movies.Cast: Owen Wilson, Vince Vaughn, Rachel McAdams

Movies.Title: Horrible Bosses
Movies.Description: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.
Movies.Cast: Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis

Movies.Title: Night at the Museum
Movies.Description: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.
Movies.Cast: Ben Stiller, Carla Gugino, Ricky Gervais

Movies.Title: Moana
Movies.Description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.
Movies.Cast: Auli'i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson, Rachel House

Movies.Title: Zootopia
Movies.Description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.
Movies.Director: Byron Howard, Rich Moore, Jared Bush
Movies.Cast: Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba

Movies.Title: WALL-E
Movies.Description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
Movies.Cast: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin

Movies.Title: Toy Story
Movies.Description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
Movies.Cast: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles

Movies.Title: The Lion King
Movies.Description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
Movies.Cast: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones
